snippet.title: Veritus - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Free Demo for Veritus on May 9th!

Unshroud secrets hidden deep within the dark chambers of the god of shadow, Veritus’ castle. Persevere through monsters and mysteries lurking in every corner. Prepare to leave camp and journey into the castle’s lonely halls by collecting resources and equipment to make it out alive.

Wishlist Veritus on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2513580/Veritus/

Buy Prodigal on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1393820/Prodigal/

Follow Colorgrave on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/ColorgraveGames

Subscribe to our Channel!
